row.process:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ECHO_ON_OFF
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION ! Logging input parameters :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Base Url" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_HPQC_BASE_URL#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Auth Token" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_HPQC_AUTH_TOKEN#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Domain Name" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_HPQC_DOMAIN_NAME#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Project Name" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_HPQC_PROJECT_NAME#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Defect Id" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_HPQC_DEFECT_ID#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Action name :SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ACTION_NAME# = "DELETE_DEFECT" ! Define java options and values :DEFINE &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#, string, 12
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[1] = "-action" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_ACTION_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[2] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[3] = "-baseurl" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_BASE_URL#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[4] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[5] = "-domain" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_DOMAIN_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[6] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[7] = "-project" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_PROJECT_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[8] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[9] = "-defectid" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_DEFECT_ID#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[10] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[11] = "-authtokenid" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_AUTH_TOKEN#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[12] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PRV.INCLUDE.BUILD_JAVA_ARGUMENTS
! Setting execution environment : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.SET_EXEC_ENVIRONMENT
java -jar &UC4RB_HPQC_PATH_JAR# &UC4RB_HPQC_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#
! Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** DELETE DEFECT ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** DELETE DEFECT ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- !Printing faliure messages as per Error code : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS
